TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "mycelium", "quantity": 32, "index": 12}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 12, "index": 22}, {"type": "cut_sandstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 26}, {"type": "large_fern", "quantity": 10, "index": 38}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 6, "index": 40}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 6, "index": 41}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 15, "index": 42}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}, {"type": "stone_button", "quantity": 22, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a stone_sword, I need to craft a stick, which requires 2 oak_planks. To craft oak_planks, I need to place oak_wood in the crafting grid. I can use the stripped_oak_wood at slot 39. I will place it in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1
